welcomePage.title: Welcome to SimpleWishlist
welcomePage.description: Create a wishlist, add your wishes and share it with your friends. They will be able to see your wishes and mark them as taken. No more duplicate gifts!
welcomePage.description2: To make things very simple, we don't require any registration. Just create a wishlist, share the personal links and let the magic happen!
welcomePage.description3: Each user accesses the wishlist via a personal link that identifies them. This link is automatically generated on wishlist's creation. It's very important that everyone uses their personal link at the risk of modifying someone else's wishes
welcomePage.description4: Click on the "Create a new Wishlist" button to get started!

createWL.title: Create a new wishlist
createWL.surpriseModeDescription: In surprise mode, you can not see who took care of your wishes nor taken wishes. It's a surprise!
